-- | Monads-tf instances for the RegionT monad transformer
--   
--   Monads-tf instances for the RegionT monad transformer
@package regions-monadstf
@version 0.3.1.7


-- | This module provides instances for the monads-tf classes for
--   <a>RegionT</a>s.
module Control.Monad.Trans.Region.Instances.MonadsTF
instance MonadState pr => MonadState (RegionT s pr)
instance MonadWriter pr => MonadWriter (RegionT s pr)
instance MonadReader pr => MonadReader (RegionT s pr)
instance MonadRWS pr => MonadRWS (RegionT s pr)
instance MonadError pr => MonadError (RegionT s pr)
instance MonadCont pr => MonadCont (RegionT s pr)
